alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Walton and southwestern Holmes Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Eglin Air Force Base, or 7 miles west of De Funiak Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Douglass Crossroad, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, Darlington, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, New Home, Knox Hill and Piney Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
